title: All the News We Covered This Week
description: the finalists for the 2025 Young Lions Fiction Award, this week's new releases and bestselling books, big library news, and more.
author: S. Zainab Williams
excerpt: the finalists for the 2025 Young Lions Fiction Award, this week's new releases and bestselling books, big library news, and more.
text: Today in Books the finalists for the 2025 Young Lions Fiction Award, this week's new releases and bestselling books, big library news, and more. S. Zainab would like to think she bleeds ink but the very idea makes her feel faint. She writes fantasy and horror, and is currently clutching a manuscript while groping in the dark. html:
Today in Books

the finalists for the 2025 Young Lions Fiction Award, this week's new releases and bestselling books, big library news, and more.

S. Zainab would like to think she bleeds ink but the very idea makes her feel faint. She writes fantasy and horror, and is currently clutching a manuscript while groping in the dark. Find her on Twitter: @szainabwilliams.
